name: Demo Gear Database
labels: demo gear track tracking database inventory
short_description: This database front-end is used for tracking the location of demo gear as it moves from sales offices to customers.  Demo gear is often shared with team members of a company and shipped all over the world.  This database helps track the current location of the gear and shows the chronological history of the items' whereabouts.
summary: MySQL/PHP demo gear tracking database used to track eval inventory
